detaileddescription.para: The layout item will be added as a card at the end of the stack.

briefdescription.para: Add a item to the underlying BCardLayout.

detaileddescription.para: The layout item will be added as a card at the end of the stack.

parameterdescription.para: The BLayoutItem to be added. The underlying BCardLayout will take ownership of the object.

sectiondef.header: Adding BLayouts and their BView Pairs

description.para: A set of methods that add a BLayout or BView subclass and return a BLayoutBuilder::Base subclass representing the newly added object. These methods push a new builder on top of the stack, you will not be using this builder again until you call End().

A GroupBuilder representing the layout of the groupView.

Shorthand for builders returned by this builder's AddSplit() methods.
Shorthand representing the type of this.

Haiku R1
The BCardLayout class is a simple BLayout subclass that arranges the items as a stack of cards with only one card being on top and visible to the user.
For a detailed view on the properties, see the class description.
